content.rendered:
Payments designed to
grow your business

No matter which payment method works best for your
business, Dynamic Merchant Solutions provides low rates
and secure transactions.
Free Quote
Contact Sales

Features

From retail shops, to eCommerce stores, and more, we have the payment solution for you.

Email Pay

Easily request payments via email.

EMV

Securely accept payments in-person.

Gift & Loyalty Program

Grow your customer base and increase revenues.

Point-of-Sale System

Take payments, track sales and inventory, and more.

Apple Pay Processing

A convenient way to pay for Apple users.

Mobile Card Payments

Accept payments with your iOS or Android phone.

Ordering App

Accept orders directly from customers with your own mobile app.

Advanced Reporting

Track sales, preferred payment methods, inventory, and more.

Online Payments / Shopping Cart

Easily expand your eCommerce offerings.

Customer Payment Portal

The easy way for customers to pay.

Recurring Billing

Retain more revenue with automated billing.

Auto Pay

Simplify your invoicing process.

Best Merchant Processing Services In Los Angeles.

Our banking and technology partners

Transform your
idea into an app
with our experts.

Let our experts create a mobile app specifically for your business and start selling directly to your customers

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Mikaela Stone

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Chris Mathew

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Start Selling with

Dynamic Merchant
Solutions.

Request a free quote from a top merchant
payment service in Los Angeles.

Apply now and get
approved as soon as 24
hours.
